com.absynth.battleship.players

Class PlayerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.absynth.battleship.players.PlayerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Player
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Computer, User

    public abstract class PlayerAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Player
    Provides a general adapter for Player class to implement some of the basic features every player must have, such as id, points and skipped turns.
    Author:
    David Boivin (Absynth)
